member.name: ISwapChainPanelNative.SetSwapChain
member.summary: Sets the DirectX swap chain for SwapChainPanel.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISwapChainPanelNative
member.summary: Provides interoperation between XAML and a DirectX swap chain. Unlike SwapChainBackgroundPanel, a SwapChainPanel can appear at any level in the XAML display tree, and more than 1 can be present in any given tree.
